fields.title: Immortals
fields.description: Epic fantasy action about Hercules and the battle against the Titans.

fields.title: Oz the Great and Powerful
fields.description: A magician is transported to the magical Land of Oz and becomes involved in a battle between good and evil witches.

fields.title: Pan's Labyrinth
fields.description: A dark fantasy tale where a young girl discovers a mysterious labyrinth filled with mythical creatures.
